#include <iostream>
#include <map>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int dp[1001];

int solve(int n, int k)
{
    if(n-k < 0) return 0;
    if(n == k) return 1;
    if(dp[n] != -1) return dp[n];

    map<int, int> m;

    for(int i = 1; i <= n-k; i++) {
        m[solve(i, k) ^ solve(n-k-i, k)] = 1;
    }
    int kk = 0;
    while(m[kk]) {
        kk++;
    }
    dp[n] = kk;
    return kk;
}

int main()
{
        int t, k;

        cin >> t >> k;
        memset(dp, -1, sizeof(dp));

        while(t--) {
            int n;
            cin >> n;
            if(solve(n, k)) {
                cout << "Brainy\n";
            }
            else {
                cout << "Clumsy\n";
            }
        }
}
